WORK WITH US

Software Engineer (Maryland)

APPLY TO THIS POSITION

Have you been working hard to improve your skills with a programming language like Java, JavaScript, or Ruby? Are you trying to learn new programming languages like Clojure or Haskell? Have you experimented with tools like Hive, Pig, or Storm? Do you enjoy working in teams with smart people who give you honest feedback and are vested in your growth?


If you answered yes to any of these questions and have a history of making an impact on projects — large or small — then we want to talk to you! Anthem Engineering is looking for software engineers who are collaborative, self-motivated, and highly skilled to join our teams. We work on projects that make our customers' lives easier through technology. We work in small teams to deliver capabilities iteratively and agilely. We're always learning and always trying to make a difference.

ADDITIONAL DESIRED TRAITS

Education: bachelor's or master's degree in computer science or related field


Experience: experience developing Java and JVM-based applications for the Federal Government


Skills:
Programming Languages: Java, JavaScript, Ruby, Python, Clojure

Cloud Computing: Hadoop, Map-Reduce, Hive, Pig, Storm, HBase, Accumulo

Relational Databases: MySQL, Postgres, Oracle

Frameworks: Spring, Rails, Angular.js, Bootstrap

Security Clearance: Active TS/SCI with fullscope polygraph


Benefits

  • Competitive salaries
  • 19 days paid time off + 10 holidays
  • Comprehensive health insurance plan
  • Yearly training budget to support a plan that you develop
  • Flexible work schedules
  • 401(k) retirement plan with company paid contribution + profit sharing

Top 5 Reasons to Work at Anthem Engineering


We realize that we all spend a considerable amount of time at work so it had better be fun!


Do work you feel good about. Our mission is to save lives and taxpayer dollars. We work to enable the mission and create reusable capabilities that can be leveraged across a diverse customer set.


We're always learning new technologies, frameworks, and tools so we can use the right ones for the emerging problems.


You're not just another cog in a machine. We're invested in your growth as an individual, technical and otherwise. Everyone has a voice and is valued.


Small companies are important to us. We enjoy the closeness, directness, and efficiency of working in a small company environment. It’s a family!


APPLY TO THIS POSITION
